Title: Blood Under the Skin
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Merriwether Williams (story), Steve Little (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Thurop Van Orman (story), Patrick McHale (story), Cole Sanchez, Benton Connor
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Maria Bamford, Pendleton Ward
Plot: Finn is made fun of by a group of knights and reacts by questing for a set of magical armor that will earn him respect.
